title: Screen freezing after Hitting play
body:
I have not played this game in a few months, But i recently updated it and everything now whenever I hit the play button the client disappears and freezes my screens and my computers isn't crashing because i can still hear music playing and i can move my  mouse but my screen is completely frozen and am unable to click on anything or alt tab...Just frozen

Can i get some help.

replies.body: Woah, that's really weird!  Is this on the legacy or updated client?  Your screen freezing and being unable to alt tab could suggest some hardware issue, or something making your hardware misbehave.  To help make sure your client is in good health, run a repair with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure everything is in order.  Try again afterwards, and let me know what happens.

I ran the repair tool and i get the same result. My computer does actually freeze and stop working all together 2 min after hitting the Launch button, _This is on the updated client._ I updated my drivers earlier today also and looked at other options like turning off the game bar and what not that i saw from post a while back.

Edit: This has never happened to me before or when i play any other game but as soon as i hit that launch button, bam i freeze
